description: Architected and deployed high-performance web applications using Astro 5 and React 19, achieving < 200ms INP.
Led a team of 5 developers in the migration of legacy systems to a modern, island-based architecture.
Implemented a comprehensive design system with 'Squishy UI' micro-interactions, increasing user engagement by 25%.
Developed and maintained scalable microservices using Node.js and GraphQL, supporting over 100k monthly active users.
Optimized database queries and implemented caching strategies, reducing API latency by 40%.
Integrated automated accessibility testing into the CI/CD pipeline, ensuring WCAG 2.1 AA compliance across all products.
Built interactive user interfaces for various client projects using Vue.js and GSAP.
Collaborated closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect, responsive layouts from Figma designs.
Improved frontend build performance by 30% through Webpack optimization and code-splitting.
